author.headline: Chief Growth Officer | Empowering Healthcare Practices with HR Compliance & Employee Management Solutions

data.text:
It's been a busy fall conference season at Arini! 

We'd like to give a special shoutout to Michelle Hambidge, Patrick Jacobwith and the entire Sunset Technologies team for putting on such a special show at the DSO Technology Summit late last month.

Our CEO Abdul Jamjoom and Head of Growth Bryan Carbaugh joined some of the best DSO Technology operators in Nashville, TN for three days of deep exploration on how to effectively integrate AI into DSO workflows at scale.

We capped the Summit with Abdul's presentation on one of the most transformative shifts in the dental industry we're proud to be leading: The Rise of AI-Native Forward Deployed Engineers.

The future belongs to DSOs that lean into AI transformation. We can't wait to share more soon!

Remember the mid-90s when every business suddenly needed a website? That‚Äôs where Voice AI is‚Äîright now. 

The phone is still your real front door, and your AI Receptionist will be your door greeter.

What our custom AI Receptionists are doing today (no hype, just capability):

üìû Answering calls 24/7 with natural, human-sounding conversations (over 15,000+ daily)

üÜï Booking patient appointments directly in the PMS (~31 month/location)

üéóÔ∏è Proactively handling patient follow-ups and re-care reminders

ü¶∑ Opportunity mining patient bases‚Äîreactivating overdue patients, recapturing unscheduled treatment, and filling last-minute openings

Voice AI isn‚Äôt a ‚Äúnice to have,‚Äù it‚Äôs the next website moment. Dental teams that adopt will capture more calls, appointments, and production.

I‚Äôm happy to share how Arini is deploying AI Receptionists as an always-on front desk for DSOs and practices (and what to watch out for so it actually works in the real world). 

DM me for the playbook.

data.text:
We're excited to be attending the DSO Technology Summit next week in Nashville, TN!

Our CEO Abdul Jamjoom will be speaking on Friday, September 19th about one of the most exciting waves in the DSO space that Arini is thrilled to be leading the charge on: The Rise of AI-Native Forward Deployed Engineers.

Abdul will be joined at the Summit by our Chief Commercial Officer Eric Johnson. We couldn't me more thrilled to meet some of the most tech-forward DSO operators and share what's coming up on our roadmap :)

P.S. -- shoutout to Michelle Hambidge, Patrick Jacobwith and the rest of the Sunset team for organizing!

resharedPost.text:
We‚Äôve been getting a lot of interest in our Forward-Deployed Engineers (FDE) approach for enterprise DSOs ‚Äî and for good reason.

FDEs are AI-native engineers embedded directly with your operations, finance, technology, revenue cycle, and patient experience teams. They don‚Äôt hand you a deck; they sit in the workflow, ship working systems, and own outcomes.

Why enterprise DSOs love this approach:

‚è∞ Speed to value: weeks, not quarters. FDEs remove handoffs between strategy, operations, vendors, and IT.

üí± Change management: train the team, measure adoption, iterate, sunset legacy tools. Real usage, real results.

üöö Enterprise-grade delivery: security, data governance, compliance, and reliability from day one.

ü§ì Talent: capable AI-native engineers are hard to find. These folks are mostly located in the Bay Area, work for companies like META & OpenAI, or are Founders of AI startups (shoutout to Abdul Jamjoom & Rami Rustom).

Simply put, dental enterprises want to transform faster ‚Äî without stalling their core operations. 

For the first time in the history of dental tech, ‚ÄúDavid" has an advantage on "Goliath" ‚Äî but only if "David" has the best and brightest AI-native engineers deployed at scale.

author.headline: CCO | Arini

data.text: FDEs are the key to dental enterprises adopting AI. Our team is growing, apply here if this interests you: https://lnkd.in/gkZZ2caw

With AI reshaping every corner of healthcare, I'm excited to join Arini as CCO to help lead our mission to bring impactful AI to dental enterprises.

DSO leaders know they need get serious about AI, but don‚Äôt know where to start. They need a partner who can help them define their AI strategy, build AI-powered tools, and deploy them at scale.

We‚Äôre not here to resell generic software or dashboards; we‚Äôre here to co-create technical solutions with DSOs that drive real outcomes.

Arini is a full-service AI Transformation Partner specifically outfitted to serve the dental industry ‚Äî think Palantir for DSOs, with the best AI-native engineers imbedded within your organization.

As CCO, I‚Äôll be orchestrating across the full Arini ecosystem to help our clients plan and implement advanced AI infrastructure and technology.

We‚Äôre excited to officially welcome Bryan Carbaugh to the Arini team!

Joining his former MIT classmates Rami Rustom and Sheel Patel, Bryan started with Arini in April this year and has been heads-down on getting Arini's flagship product‚Äîour AI Receptionist for Dentists‚Äîup and running in DSOs across the country.

With both engineering and product experience at Apple, SpaceX, Tesla and Goldman Sachs Hong Kong, Bryan brings a remarkably unique perspective to both the Arini team and the broader dental industry.

As we continue to rapidly build the most talented team in dental tech, we‚Äôre looking for the best AI-native engineers and dental industry experts to come onboard. Come join us!

p.s. stay tuned‚Äîwe can't wait to announce a legendary new member to the Arini team who's already been making a massive impact üëÄ

author.headline: CEO at Arini (YC) | The DSO AI Transformation Partner

data.text:
We are growing the Arini team! Our MRR has doubled in April, and our DSOs are rolling out Arini faster than we‚Äôve ever seen before. To support this growth, we are hiring more engineers, in person, in San Francisco! (as well as forward-deployed engineers for our largest DSOs)

Arini started as an inbound voice agent for DSOs and Dental Groups. This allowed us to scale to hundreds of DSOs in the past few months, and invest in building infrastructure and a framework that now allows us to deploy various types of custom agents in dental ‚Äî think managing patient comms (call, text, web chat), online scheduling, performance tracking/alerting, schedule optimization, and more.

The next 5 months are going to be intense, exciting, and rewarding. We are looking for folks who can hit the ground running, go heads down on difficult scaling challenges, and build a world-class product. Dental software is known to look ugly, feel sluggish, and barely work. We are resetting the bar for the industry.

PS: $10K referral bonus for any engineer we end up hiring. Mention your smartest engineer friends below or DM me their info!

author.headline: CEO at Arini (YC) | The DSO AI Transformation Partner

Revolutionizing Dental Practices with AI! 
In our latest episode of the Dental Disruptors Podcast, we had the pleasure of hosting Rami Rustom Co-Founder of Arini, a groundbreaking AI company transforming how dental offices handle front desk operations. 
Rami shares fascinating insights into how AI is not just about replacing staff but maximizing efficiency, especially in managing missed calls ‚Äî a critical part of any dental practice's operations. From answering calls to scheduling appointments, II‚Äôs AI receptionist is changing the game in dental tech.
The future of AI in dentistry is moving at lightning speed, and practices that get ahead of the curve will benefit from reduced costs and improved patient service. 
Key takeaways:
- AI's role in improving front office efficiency
- How AI can help manage missed calls and improve ROI
- The future of AI in dental practices: from agents to data-driven systems

Don‚Äôt miss this episode as we dive into the future of AI in dental practice management!

üëâ Listen now: https://lnkd.in/dKD2fBaS

#DentalTech #AIinDentistry #DentalInnovation #DentalDisruptors #TechForDentists #DentalPractice #AI #DentalTechPodcast #DisruptingDentistry #FutureOfDentistry

data.text:
DSOs and Dental Groups have access to a ton of data, but it's all siloed behind closed doors in different platforms with archaic or non-existent APIs, making it very difficult to generate organization-wide metrics. Kolla fixes that, and they are excellent at it.

Rami Rustom (Arini's CTO) had a very insightful chat with Clint Berry and Jake Larsen about AI and data in Dentistry. Check it out!

We couldn't be more excited to welcome Tanner Wright to lead Arini's Customer Success Team! 

Tanner brings over a decade of experience building world-class CX teams from the ground up at some of the fastest-growing companies in dental.

He joins us as we continue to rapidly expand our team and ship the best AI products at the fastest pace in the industry. In other words, we're hiring :)

data.text:
Beyond excited to have Tanner Wright lead CX at Arini!

Tanner and I met two weeks ago through a mutual connection in the DSO space. I was working their Arini account, and the DSO exec introduced us, telling me how incredible Tanner is. I knew I had to get him to join us somehow. Pinged him on LinkedIn, scheduled a call, showed him Arini, went over our strategy, growth, and roadmap, had him meet the team, and he officially signed with us last Friday!

It was an incredible feeling to introduce him to the DSO on Slack as the Head of CX at Arini.

data.text:
üî• Are you losing new patients before they even walk through your door?

Every missed call is a lost opportunity. Even the best front desk teams get overwhelmed‚Äîcalls go unanswered, key details slip through, and potential patients move on. But what if there was a way to answer every call, collect the right information, and book more appointments‚Äîwithout hiring more staff?

In this episode, Jake Puhl sits down with Abdulrahman Jamjoom, CEO & Co-Founder of Arini AI, to share how practices are filling their schedules without extra work.

üó£Ô∏è‚ÄúThe main value of Arini is the ability to achieve a 90% call answer rate while giving patients access to our office 24/7. Arini saves us a lot of time and ensures we never miss an opportunity to connect with our patients. I would highly recommend Arini to any practice looking to streamline operations.‚Äù ‚Äî Danya Mcgee, Regional Operations Manager | Normandy Lake Dentistry (3 Locations Group)

We tuned our AI to answer questions about our dental assistant training program, handle complex referral call flows, as well as schedule general dentistry appointments. ‚Äù ‚Äî Tanya Taylor, COO | Complete Dental Group (3 Locations Group)

Don't miss out on this simple way to increase patient bookings and revenue! üöÄ Like, share, and let us know your thoughts! üí¨

author.headline: CEO at Arini (YC) | The DSO AI Transformation Partner

resharedPost.text:
This past weekend, we attended our first dental conference of 2025 -- Yankee Dental Congress in Boston. It was wild! Starting a dental practice in 2025 looks completely different from previous years. The sheer amount of AI companies in dental is incredible: Automate all patient comms with Arini, automate revenue cycle management, automate collections, imaging analysis, and more.

With all these AI advancements, it's natural for people to be skeptical about whether these systems work. What made us stand out is the following:
* A real-time map showcasing live calls, updating every few seconds
* Recent testimonials proving that Arini is not just an idea - we are actively reducing headcount by 15-20% for DSOs and saving hours of work every day
* A live demo: Pick up the phone and try it out
* (was not planned) Dentists who use Arini were around to discuss implementation details and share their journey firsthand

Check out www.arini.ai/#case-studies to hear more about how Arini is helping DSOs, dental groups, and solo practices across the US and Canada!

data.text:
So many AI companies are trying to automate anything and everything...which is incredible! Though people are naturally skeptical...does this AI thing actually work? Are others already using it? Is this just a nice demo?

At Yankee Dental Congress this past weekend we decided to sell by focusing on showing Arini's impact and scale in real time. Map of live calls, test it yourself, testimonials on loop, existing clients around to share implementation details...etc. The results were phenomenal. Going heads down on this strategy.

data.text:
Had an incredible kick-off at DEO: The Dentist Entrepreneur Organization last night! Met some amazing industry leaders: Darin Acopan, Clint Berry, and Louis Chan. Onboarded incredible dental groups and linked-up with some of our beloved practices.

Visit us at booth #55

resharedPost.text:
Arini (YC W24) is an AI receptionist for dental clinics that answers phone calls, and schedules appointments. 

Today's dental front desks are often stretched too thin, spending most of their time on the phone, yet still missing 35% of calls. Missed calls = missed revenue. Arini answers 100% of calls, 24/7.

Founders Abdulrahman Jamjoom and Rami Rustom met in high school in Jordan and co-founded a startup together two years ago. Computer science grads from Harvard and MIT respectively, they eventually worked together at Threads, an enterprise communication tool, where they led the AI team automating customer support, document feedback, notification triaging, and more.

After going door-to-door to dentists, shadowing them, and directly observing the challenges they encountered, they learned that the front desk was a critical bottleneck in increasing bookings, despite dentists in the US spending $7 billion annually on front desk staffing.

With Arini, they're helping practices increase revenue by booking more appointments, while also helping them reduce their operating costs.

Learn more at https://lnkd.in/gVQ65Ead and sign up for a demo at https://www.arini.ai.

Congrats Abdul and Rami on the launch!

data.text: Excited to share what I've been working on with¬†Rami Rustom. Tell your dentist to sign up at¬†https://arini.ai!
